Summary: The University of Edinburgh's Data Analysis and Statistics for Business course (CMSE11615) introduces students to business statistics and decision-making. The course focuses on statistical methodologies and data analytics techniques to extract information and guide decision-making, equipping students with tools and methods for practical data analysis.

The Web and Social Network Analytics course at the University of Edinburgh provides postgraduate students with foundational knowledge and practical skills in analyzing web data, including web page analysis, social network analysis, and recommendation system design. The course utilizes Python for hands-on exercises and coursework assessments, enabling students to gain real-world experience in data analysis. Completion of this course enhances students' understanding of contemporary business and management problems and equips them with communication, numeracy, problem-solving, and cognitive skills essential for success in the field.
